title: [Bug]: Content Shared to MaterialNotes Displays as JSON
body:
**Bug Description**  
In version v2.0.0-dev1, when sharing content to MaterialNotes, the content is converted into a JSON-like format: `[{"insert": xxx}]`. This issue does not occur in v1.12.1.

**To Reproduce**  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Share any content to MaterialNotes.

**Expected Behavior**  
The content should be shared and displayed correctly in MaterialNotes, not in a JSON-like format.

**Screen Recording**  
https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/82871593-cd54-469b-8c7e-14ddd215c0ab

**Smartphone**  
- Device: generic_x86_64 (Android Studio x86 emulator)  
- OS: Android 9
comments: Thank you for reporting this and for making very detailed bug reports. In the future, when using pre-release versions, please make the bug reports directly in the corresponding [discussion](https://github.com/maelchiotti/LocalMaterialNotes/discussions/397), so this way issues are only about production (I'll close this one for this reason but I'll fix it before the release of course).
